summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 16, Summit Addition Supplemental, being the alley between 17th Avenue North and 18th Avenue North, from East Denny Way to East John Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 93765 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
